transcript.text: [Music]
hi sir patrick mack i'm lisa from ohio
and thank you so much for the
opportunity to let me share just a small
little piece of what hugh means to me i
am a newbie i just started following the
movement back in May thanks to my sister
who read pilled me and ever since then
it's just been a non-stop daily learning
experience for me and an awakening for
me and it's been incredible to learn all
of these truths and some it's taken just
a little bit to allow it to sink in and
it is just completely mind-blowing I am
so thankful for you and the team to
deliver this message to us and I am just
so grateful for that and so thankful for
you and those like you that break down
the posts and share them with all of us
so that we can have a better
understanding of what it means and what
is going on so thank you so much for
that I really appreciate it q for me
just brings me hope for our future and
for me it's just all about knowing the
truth and that is just so important to
me and it can be so frustrating when we
see the media you know we are not biased
and we're not unhinged we're not
deranged and we're not a cult
and we oppose violence in all forms so
all we want is the truth to come out and
for justice to be served and for America
to simply be the country that we so love
and adore so we're getting there and
it's exciting to see so thank you and
thank you cue and team so very much
thank you is just never going to be
enough but from the bottom of my heart
thank you for waking me up and where we
go we go
[Music]
you
